TextBlock.Text: TULIP: Fern, Dahlia, and me are heading towards the SSPU warp.
BASIL: Do not enter! I'm not sure what happened but one of the wires snapped!. The powerfail protocol didn't activate!
BASIL: Visiting the SSPU right now will be most likely lethal! Stay where you are while I activate it manually!
DAHILA: The signal seems to be extremely weak. Whatever it is that you want to tell us, Im sure we could discuss it inside.
BASIL: Wait! Go back! Do not enter! Do Not-
